Title: Includes information on if a person previously lived in a nursing home on his or her death certificate
Summary: Includes information on if a person previously lived in a nursing home on his or her death certificate.
LawCode: Amd ยง4141, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to including information on if a person previously lived in a nursing home on his or her death certificate
